alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Limestone; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 3:32PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Limestone, northwestern Morgan and eastern Lawrence Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 331 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Trinity, or 8 miles northeast of Moulton, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Decatur, Athens, Hartselle, Moulton, Priceville, Trinity, Town Creek, Courtland, Tanner and North Courtland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
